content: by - theselovinghands - jenni abreviations materials chain = chain worsted weight yarn 5 m double_crochet = double_crochet 4mm crochet hook nx = next tapestry needle done with worsted weight yarn puzzle round = round piece will measure approx 7cm 3 single_crochet = single_crochet inches square gauge not slip_stitch = slip_stitch important ch4 and join to form a ring work rd1 into this ring rd1 ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet now and throughout 2dc ch2 3dc x3 double_crochet into 3rd chain of initial ch3 rd2 ch3 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in 1st ch2 space from rd1 double_crochet in nx 2 double_crochet ch3 work 5sc in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in nx chain double_crochet in nx double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc in nx ch2 space ¤ ch2 slip_stitch in nx 3 double_crochet ch2¤ 2dc ch2 2dc in nx ch2 space repeat ¤ -¤ 2dc ch2 2dc repeat - join with slip_stitch to top of initial ch3 for more patterns by jenni please check out http //theselovinghands etsy com please note that this pattern is for personal use only the item made from this pattern may be sold for fundraising/charity purposes only and not for personal profit please do not post/publish pattern anywhere without written permission
